ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Business_Unit__c, 'ABHFL'), ISPICKVAL(Nature__c, 'Complaint'), Owner:User.Assigned_Team__c <> 'Grievance Team', ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Open') || ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'In Progress'), OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Branch'), NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(ABHFL_Case_Detail__r.Complaint_Type__c), 'Branch Walkin')) ) ||AND(NOT(TEXT(ABHFL_Case_Detail__r.Complaint_Type__c) = ''), ISNEW()), AND( ISPICKVAL(Source__c, 'Call Center'), NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(ABHFL_Case_Detail__r.Complaint_Type__c), 'Phone Inbound')) ) || AND(NOT(TEXT(ABHFL_Case_Detail__r.Complaint_Type__c) = ''), ISNEW() ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Grievance members can change complaint type. Branch Users please select 'Branch Walkin', Call Center Users please select 'Phone Inbound'.
